input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

items The items XML used to create one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values:
Create_VM_Snapshot, Create_VM, Clone_VM, Create_Host, Create_VM_With_Custom_Settings, Clone_VM_With_Custom_Settings, Add_Host_To_Cluster Add_NAS_Datastore Add_Vmfs_Datastore Add_Internet_Scsi_Send_Targets Create_VApp Clone_VApp Create_Resource_Pool
version The VMware Infrastructure Application version. The current supported version are v3.0 and v4.0 only

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Create Items Create one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
